SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.util

Class MimeTypes

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.util.MimeTypes
public final class MimeTypes extends Object
This class represents the mime type registry that is responsible for providing resolving mime types through all system components.

The registry is initialized from the file org.opencastproject.util.MimeTypes.xml.

  • Method Details

    • toMimeType

      public static Optional<MimeType> toMimeType(String name)

    • parseMimeType

      public static MimeType parseMimeType(String mimeType)
      Returns a mime type for the given type and subtype, e. g. video/mj2.
      Parameters:
      mimeType - the mime type
      Returns:
      the corresponding mime type

    • fromSuffix

      public static MimeType fromSuffix(String suffix) throws UnknownFileTypeException
      Returns a mime type for the provided file suffix.

      For example, if the suffix is mj2, the mime type will be that of a ISO Motion JPEG 2000 document.

      If no mime type is found for the suffix, a UnknownFileTypeException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      suffix - the file suffix
      Returns:
      the corresponding mime type
      Throws:
      UnknownFileTypeException - if the suffix does not map to a mime type

    • fromURI

      public static MimeType fromURI(URI uri) throws UnknownFileTypeException
      Returns a mime type for the provided file.

      This method tries various ways to extract mime type information from the files name or its contents.

      If no mime type can be derived from either the file name or its contents, a UnknownFileTypeException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      uri - the file
      Returns:
      the corresponding mime type
      Throws:
      UnknownFileTypeException - if the mime type cannot be derived from the file

    • fromString

      public static MimeType fromString(String name) throws UnknownFileTypeException
      Returns a mime type for the provided file name.

      This method tries to find the mime type from the file name suffix (extension).

      If no mime type can be derived from the file name, an UnknownFileTypeException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      name - the file
      Returns:
      the corresponding mime type
      Throws:
      UnknownFileTypeException - if the mime type cannot be derived from the file

    • getMimeType

      public static String getMimeType(String name)
      Convenience method to get a mime type as String from a filename extension
      Parameters:
      name - the filename
      Returns:
      the corresponding mime type or DEFAULT_TYPE if no match
